title: 8 Ways To Get a Free Subway Gift Card
description: Do you want to learn how to get free Subway gift cards? Free gift cards can be a great way to enjoy your favorite sandwiches without spending money. These cards let you get tasty subs at no cost to you, so it’s like getting free food! There are many ways to get your hands on... The post 8 Ways To Get a Free Subway Gift Card appeared first on Making Sense Of Cents.
author: Michelle Schroeder-Gardner
excerpt: Here are the best ways to get a free Subway gift card. I have personally earned over $1,000 in free gift cards using these sites!
text: Do you want to learn how to get free Subway gift cards? Free gift cards can be a great way to enjoy your favorite sandwiches without spending money. These cards let you get tasty subs at no cost to you, so it’s like getting free food! There are many ways to get your hands on… Do you want to learn how to get free Subway gift cards? Free gift cards can be a great way to enjoy your favorite sandwiches without spending money. These cards let you get tasty subs at no cost to you, so it’s like getting free food! There are many ways to get your hands on free Subway gift cards. You can earn them by taking surveys, watching videos, shopping online, and more. If you’re looking to enjoy free Subway meals, you’re in the right place! I’ve personally earned over $1,000 in free gift cards using sites listed in this article, so I know that it’s possible. Best Ways To Get Free Subway Gift Cards Here’s a quick list before we begin: Fetch Rewards PrizeRebel Branded Surveys Survey Junkie Prime Opinion HeyCash  Five Surveys KashKick Below are the best ways to get a free Subway gift card. 1. Fetch Rewards Fetch Rewards is a free app that gives you gift cards for scanning your grocery receipts. It’s super easy to use and works with almost any store. I use Fetch Rewards all the time and I most recently used it today. I earn points on all of my grocery receipts and it only takes a quick moment to do. When you go shopping, you just take a picture of your receipt with your phone. The app gives you points for each receipt you scan (from any store no matter what you buy). You can earn more points by buying certain brands or products (such as a specific brand of pasta sauce or a carton of eggs). You don’t need to do anything special while shopping. Just buy what you normally would and after you’re done, open the app and take a photo of your grocery receipt. You can scan receipts from grocery stores, restaurants, gas stations, and more. You can even earn points on the Fetch Rewards app for spending money at Subway! Once you have enough points, you can trade them for gift cards, such as Subway (you can get gift cards in the amounts of $5, $10, $25, and $50). There are lots of other choices, like Amazon, Target, and Starbucks. You can also use your points to help charities if you want. You have 14 days to scan your receipts, but I always just scan mine right when I hop into my car so that I don’t forget. The app also lets you scan up to 35 receipts in a week. You can sign up for Fetch Rewards by clicking here. Recommended reading: Fetch Rewards Review Here are the free Subway gift cards you can get from PrizeRebel. 2. PrizeRebel PrizeRebel is a rewards website where you can earn points by doing things like watching videos, taking surveys, and signing up for offers to earn points. These activities are free and easy to do in your spare time. Once you have enough points, you can trade them for Subway gift cards. You can use your points toward $5 Subway egift cards, or you can even get physical Subway gift cards as well. You can also choose other gift cards or get cash through PayPal. PrizeRebel is user-friendly and doesn’t cost anything to join. You can start earning points right away after you sign up. Sign up for PrizeRebel by clicking here. 3. Branded Surveys Branded Surveys is a great way to earn free Subway gift cards. You can sign up for free and start taking surveys right away. The site is easy to use. You just answer questions about products and services. Each survey can pay between 50 cents and $5, depending on how long it takes. You can earn points in other ways too. There’s a daily poll that gives you 5 points. You can also invite friends to join and get bonus points. Once you have 500 points, you can cash out. That’s equal to $5. You can choose a Subway gift card (with a value of anywhere from $5 to $250) or other rewards like PayPal cash. Sign up for Branded Surveys here and receive a free 100-point sign-up bonus. Recommended reading: Branded Surveys Review: How Much You Can Earn 4. Survey Junkie Survey Junkie is a popular website where you can earn money by taking online surveys. It’s free to join and easy to use. You can start making extra cash right away. When you sign up, you’ll fill out a profile that tells Survey Junkie more about you, such as your age, household income, and where you live. This helps Survey Junkie match you with surveys that fit you best. Survey Junkie pays about $1 to $3 for each survey. Most surveys take 5-20 minutes to finish, and the longer surveys usually pay more. Each survey gives you points and these points can be turned into real money. You can get paid through PayPal or choose gift cards from places like Subway, Amazon, or Target. To join Survey Junkie, you need to be at least 16 years old. You also have to live in the United States, Canada, or Australia. Sign up for Survey Junkie here. Recommended reading: Survey Junkie Review 5. Prime Opinion Prime Opinion is a website where you can earn money by taking surveys. It’s easy to use and you can start right away. There are lots of surveys to choose from on Prime Opinion. You can pick the ones you like and do them when you have free time. Many people find surveys they can do every day, and I personally have over 20 surveys available for me to take right now, so I know there are plenty of options. You get points for each survey you finish. These points can be turned into real money or gift cards to Subway. You can also get paid through PayPal, Venmo, or have money sent to your bank account. Please click here to sign up for Prime Opinion and get up to a $5 free bonus (500 free bonus points). Recommended reading: Prime Opinion Review: How Much Does Prime Opinion Pay? 6. HeyCash HeyCash is a website that lets you earn money by taking surveys, trying out apps, and playing games. You can get cash or gift cards for completing these tasks. HeyCash has a low minimum payout of $1 for PayPal withdrawals. This is equal to 1,000 points on their system, so it’s really easy and quick to get your first payout. For gift cards, you need to earn at least 5,000 points. This is worth $5 in gift cards. You can use HeyCash to get free Subway gift cards. Once you earn enough points, pick the Subway gift card option. After getting your Subway gift card, you can use it like cash at any Subway restaurant. Just give it to the cashier when you order. You can click here to sign up for HeyCash. 7. Five Surveys Five Surveys is a good way to make some extra cash online. It’s super easy to use. You just answer questions, and for every five surveys you finish, you get $5 (so you are getting a dollar for each survey you complete). When you sign up, you’ll see lots of surveys waiting for you. Some take just a minute and are short surveys, while others might take half an hour (but you get paid the same amount no matter the length of time it takes you to finish it). You can pick the ones that fit your schedule. Five Surveys asks about all sorts of things. For example, they might want to know how often you go shopping (once a week or every day?) or what kind of snacks you like. The best part? You don’t have to wait forever to get your money. As soon as you finish five surveys, you can cash out. You can get your earnings through PayPal, bank transfer, or even gift cards to places like Subway, Walmart, or Apple. Please click here to sign up for Five Surveys. Recommended reading: Five Surveys Review 8. KashKick KashKick is a fun way to make some extra money online. You can earn rewards by doing simple tasks like taking surveys and playing games. It’s free to join and easy to use. With KashKick, you can play popular games like Monopoly GO, Yahtzee, and Scrabble Go. Some games even let you earn over $100 just for playing! Taking surveys is another way to make money on KashKick. These usually take less than 20 minutes and can pay between $1 and $5 each, so it’s a quick way to earn some cash in your spare time. KashKick also has special offers where you can earn money by trying new apps or services. For example, you might get $4 just for signing up for a new app or signing up for a trial. Sign up for KashKick here. Recommended reading: KashKick Review: Is It Worth It? Frequently Asked Questions Below are answers to common questions about how to get free Subway gift cards. Is it possible to get free gift cards? Yes, you can get free gift cards. Many websites and apps have ways to earn them, and I have personally earned over $1,000 in free gift cards over the years. You can take surveys, watch videos, play games, and more to get free gift cards. Fetch Rewards and Freecash are some of my favorite options. These sites give you points for easy activities. You can then trade those points for gift cards. Can you get $5 Subway gift cards? Yes, there are many ways to get free $5 Subway gift cards, such as by earning points on Fetch Rewards and Branded Surveys. You can also buy Subway gift cards at a discount online from other people who are selling them. Is there a way to get Subway gift cards without paying? You can get Subway gift cards without spending money by earning points on rewards platforms. Prime Opinion lets you share your thoughts and earn rewards. You answer questions about products or services. Over time, your points add up. Then you can pick a Subway gift card as your prize. It takes some effort, but you don’t pay anything out of pocket. How To Get a Free Subway Gift Card – Summary I hope you enjoyed my article on how to get a free Subway gift card. If you’re a fan of Subway and want to enjoy your favorite footlongs without spending your own money, earning free Subway gift cards is a great option. There are plenty of easy ways to get these gift cards, such as signing up for survey websites, scanning receipts, or playing mobile games through reward apps. Apps like Fetch Rewards, PrizeRebel, and Branded Surveys have easy ways to collect points, which you can then trade for Subway gift cards. Getting free gift cards is not only possible, but it’s something I’ve done myself. By using platforms like Swagbucks and Fetch Rewards, I’ve earned over $1,000 in free gift cards. With just a little effort, you can start collecting rewards and treat yourself to delicious Subway meals for free. It’s a fun and easy way to save on food! What is your favorite way to get free Subway gift cards? html:
Do you want to learn how to get free Subway gift cards? Free gift cards can be a great way to enjoy your favorite sandwiches without spending money. These cards let you get tasty subs at no cost to you, so it’s like getting free food! There are many ways to get your hands on…

Do you want to learn how to get free Subway gift cards?

Free gift cards can be a great way to enjoy your favorite sandwiches without spending money. These cards let you get tasty subs at no cost to you, so it’s like getting free food!

There are many ways to get your hands on free Subway gift cards. You can earn them by taking surveys, watching videos, shopping online, and more.

If you’re looking to enjoy free Subway meals, you’re in the right place! I’ve personally earned over $1,000 in free gift cards using sites listed in this article, so I know that it’s possible.

Best Ways To Get Free Subway Gift Cards

Here’s a quick list before we begin:

  • Fetch Rewards
  • PrizeRebel
  • Branded Surveys
  • Survey Junkie
  • Prime Opinion
  • HeyCash 
  • Five Surveys
  • KashKick

Below are the best ways to get a free Subway gift card.

1. Fetch Rewards

Fetch Rewards is a free app that gives you gift cards for scanning your grocery receipts. It’s super easy to use and works with almost any store.

I use Fetch Rewards all the time and I most recently used it today. I earn points on all of my grocery receipts and it only takes a quick moment to do.

When you go shopping, you just take a picture of your receipt with your phone. The app gives you points for each receipt you scan (from any store no matter what you buy). You can earn more points by buying certain brands or products (such as a specific brand of pasta sauce or a carton of eggs).

You don’t need to do anything special while shopping. Just buy what you normally would and after you’re done, open the app and take a photo of your grocery receipt.

You can scan receipts from grocery stores, restaurants, gas stations, and more. You can even earn points on the Fetch Rewards app for spending money at Subway!

Once you have enough points, you can trade them for gift cards, such as Subway (you can get gift cards in the amounts of $5, $10, $25, and $50). There are lots of other choices, like Amazon, Target, and Starbucks. You can also use your points to help charities if you want.

You have 14 days to scan your receipts, but I always just scan mine right when I hop into my car so that I don’t forget. The app also lets you scan up to 35 receipts in a week.

You can sign up for Fetch Rewards by clicking here.

Recommended reading: Fetch Rewards Review

2. PrizeRebel

PrizeRebel is a rewards website where you can earn points by doing things like watching videos, taking surveys, and signing up for offers to earn points. These activities are free and easy to do in your spare time.

Once you have enough points, you can trade them for Subway gift cards. You can use your points toward $5 Subway egift cards, or you can even get physical Subway gift cards as well. You can also choose other gift cards or get cash through PayPal.

PrizeRebel is user-friendly and doesn’t cost anything to join. You can start earning points right away after you sign up.

Sign up for PrizeRebel by clicking here.

3. Branded Surveys

Branded Surveys is a great way to earn free Subway gift cards. You can sign up for free and start taking surveys right away.

The site is easy to use. You just answer questions about products and services. Each survey can pay between 50 cents and $5, depending on how long it takes.

You can earn points in other ways too. There’s a daily poll that gives you 5 points. You can also invite friends to join and get bonus points.

Once you have 500 points, you can cash out. That’s equal to $5. You can choose a Subway gift card (with a value of anywhere from $5 to $250) or other rewards like PayPal cash.

Sign up for Branded Surveys here and receive a free 100-point sign-up bonus.

Recommended reading: Branded Surveys Review: How Much You Can Earn

4. Survey Junkie

Survey Junkie is a popular website where you can earn money by taking online surveys. It’s free to join and easy to use. You can start making extra cash right away.

When you sign up, you’ll fill out a profile that tells Survey Junkie more about you, such as your age, household income, and where you live. This helps Survey Junkie match you with surveys that fit you best.

Survey Junkie pays about $1 to $3 for each survey. Most surveys take 5-20 minutes to finish, and the longer surveys usually pay more.

Each survey gives you points and these points can be turned into real money. You can get paid through PayPal or choose gift cards from places like Subway, Amazon, or Target.

To join Survey Junkie, you need to be at least 16 years old. You also have to live in the United States, Canada, or Australia.

Sign up for Survey Junkie here.

Recommended reading: Survey Junkie Review

5. Prime Opinion

Prime Opinion is a website where you can earn money by taking surveys. It’s easy to use and you can start right away.

There are lots of surveys to choose from on Prime Opinion. You can pick the ones you like and do them when you have free time. Many people find surveys they can do every day, and I personally have over 20 surveys available for me to take right now, so I know there are plenty of options.

You get points for each survey you finish. These points can be turned into real money or gift cards to Subway. You can also get paid through PayPal, Venmo, or have money sent to your bank account.

Please click here to sign up for Prime Opinion and get up to a $5 free bonus (500 free bonus points).

Recommended reading: Prime Opinion Review: How Much Does Prime Opinion Pay?

6. HeyCash

HeyCash is a website that lets you earn money by taking surveys, trying out apps, and playing games. You can get cash or gift cards for completing these tasks.

HeyCash has a low minimum payout of $1 for PayPal withdrawals. This is equal to 1,000 points on their system, so it’s really easy and quick to get your first payout.

For gift cards, you need to earn at least 5,000 points. This is worth $5 in gift cards.

You can use HeyCash to get free Subway gift cards. Once you earn enough points, pick the Subway gift card option.

After getting your Subway gift card, you can use it like cash at any Subway restaurant. Just give it to the cashier when you order.

You can click here to sign up for HeyCash.

7. Five Surveys

Five Surveys is a good way to make some extra cash online. It’s super easy to use. You just answer questions, and for every five surveys you finish, you get $5 (so you are getting a dollar for each survey you complete).

When you sign up, you’ll see lots of surveys waiting for you. Some take just a minute and are short surveys, while others might take half an hour (but you get paid the same amount no matter the length of time it takes you to finish it). You can pick the ones that fit your schedule.

Five Surveys asks about all sorts of things. For example, they might want to know how often you go shopping (once a week or every day?) or what kind of snacks you like.

The best part? You don’t have to wait forever to get your money. As soon as you finish five surveys, you can cash out. You can get your earnings through PayPal, bank transfer, or even gift cards to places like Subway, Walmart, or Apple.

Please click here to sign up for Five Surveys.

Recommended reading: Five Surveys Review

8. KashKick

KashKick is a fun way to make some extra money online. You can earn rewards by doing simple tasks like taking surveys and playing games. It’s free to join and easy to use.

With KashKick, you can play popular games like Monopoly GO, Yahtzee, and Scrabble Go. Some games even let you earn over $100 just for playing!

Taking surveys is another way to make money on KashKick. These usually take less than 20 minutes and can pay between $1 and $5 each, so it’s a quick way to earn some cash in your spare time.

KashKick also has special offers where you can earn money by trying new apps or services. For example, you might get $4 just for signing up for a new app or signing up for a trial.

Sign up for KashKick here.

Recommended reading: KashKick Review: Is It Worth It?

Frequently Asked Questions

Below are answers to common questions about how to get free Subway gift cards.

Is it possible to get free gift cards?

Yes, you can get free gift cards. Many websites and apps have ways to earn them, and I have personally earned over $1,000 in free gift cards over the years. You can take surveys, watch videos, play games, and more to get free gift cards. Fetch Rewards and Freecash are some of my favorite options. These sites give you points for easy activities. You can then trade those points for gift cards.

Can you get $5 Subway gift cards?

Yes, there are many ways to get free $5 Subway gift cards, such as by earning points on Fetch Rewards and Branded Surveys. You can also buy Subway gift cards at a discount online from other people who are selling them.

Is there a way to get Subway gift cards without paying?

You can get Subway gift cards without spending money by earning points on rewards platforms. Prime Opinion lets you share your thoughts and earn rewards. You answer questions about products or services. Over time, your points add up. Then you can pick a Subway gift card as your prize. It takes some effort, but you don’t pay anything out of pocket.

How To Get a Free Subway Gift Card – Summary

I hope you enjoyed my article on how to get a free Subway gift card.

If you’re a fan of Subway and want to enjoy your favorite footlongs without spending your own money, earning free Subway gift cards is a great option. There are plenty of easy ways to get these gift cards, such as signing up for survey websites, scanning receipts, or playing mobile games through reward apps. Apps like Fetch Rewards, PrizeRebel, and Branded Surveys have easy ways to collect points, which you can then trade for Subway gift cards.

Getting free gift cards is not only possible, but it’s something I’ve done myself. By using platforms like Swagbucks and Fetch Rewards, I’ve earned over $1,000 in free gift cards. With just a little effort, you can start collecting rewards and treat yourself to delicious Subway meals for free. It’s a fun and easy way to save on food!

What is your favorite way to get free Subway gift cards?
